titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31994D0673 English

94/673/CFSP: Council Decision of 10 October 1994 concerning the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and regarding the suspension of certain restrictions on trade with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (Serbia and Montenegro)

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 94/673/CFSP: Council Decision of 10 October 1994 concerning the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and regarding the suspension of certain restrictions on trade with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (Serbia and Montenegro)
body.p: COUNCIL DECISION of 10 October 1994 concerning the common position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union and regarding the suspension of certain restrictions on trade with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (Serbia and Montenegro) (94/673/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article J.2 thereof,
Having regard to Resolution 943 (1994) adopted on 23 September 1994 by the United Nations Security Council,

In accordance with Resolution 943 (1994) adopted on 23 September 1994 by the United Nations Security Council, certain restrictions on trade with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (Serbia and Montenegro) will be suspended.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
